mapper.insert: insert into user_volunteer (id, user_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_date, volunteer_time, comment, term) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{volunteerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteerDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteerTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_volunteer set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, volunteer_name = #{volunteerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volunteer_date = #{volunteerDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volunteer_time = #{volunteerTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_date, volunteer_time, comment, term from user_volunteer
